disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of pelvis

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be absent initially, can become severe as the tumor grows and invades surrounding structures

symptoms.name: Mass
symptoms.pattern: Palpable mass in the pelvic region

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: Muscle weakness due to tumor infiltration

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: General feeling of tiredness and weakness

vital_signs.temperature: May be elevated in the presence of infection or inflammation
vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated due to pain or systemic effects
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated due to pain or systemic effects

imaging_findings.CT scan: May show a mass in the pelvis, its size, location, and extent of invasion
imaging_findings.MRI: Provides detailed images of soft tissues, helping to characterize the tumor and assess its relationship to surrounding structures
imaging_findings.PET scan: May be used to detect metastasis

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the pelvis
supportive: Clinical symptoms and signs consistent with a pelvic mass
